trans-unit.resname: BLB·183 | Lumra, Bellow of the Woods | Card Name
BLB·183 | Lumra, Bellow of the Woods | Card Text | Paragraph 1
BLB·183 | Lumra, Bellow of the Woods | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

trans-unit.resname: BLB·183 | Lumra, Bellow of the Woods | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Lumra enters, mill four cards. Then return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: When Lumra enters, mill four cards. Then return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

BLB·224 | Mabel, Heir to Cragflame | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters, create Cragflame, a legendary colorless Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance, trample, and haste" and equip {2}.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters, create Cragflame, a legendary colorless Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance, trample, and haste" and equip {2}.

trans-unit.source: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

trans-unit.resname: BLB·379 | Bria, Riptide Rogue | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Other creatures you control have prowess. (If a creature has multiple instances of prowess, each triggers separately.)
trans-unit.target: Other creatures you control have prowess. (If a creature has multiple instances of prowess, each triggers separately.)

trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature you control can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature you control can't be blocked this turn.

BLB·380 | Byrke, Long Ear of the Law | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.

trans-unit.resname: BLB·380 | Byrke, Long Ear of the Law | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on it.
